Go-NoGo Task.Description: The Go-NoGo Task measures ability to inhibit a motor response
Go-NoGo Task.DatasetType: derivitive - summary data produced by code/GNG_WF.py

all_nGo.Description: Number of Go trials across all blocks

all_nNoGo.Description: Number of NoGo trials across all blocks

all_nAcc.Description: Number of accurate responses (for Go and NoGo trials) across all blocks

all_pAcc.Description: Percent accuracy (for Go and NoGo trials) across all blocks

all_nGo_Hit.Description: Number of correct Go responses (hits) across all blocks

all_nGo_Miss.Description: Number of incorrect Go responses (misses) across all blocks

all_nNoGo_Corr.Description: Number of correct NoGo responses across all blocks

all_nNoGo_FA.Description: Number of incorrect NoGo responses (false alarms) across all blocks

all_pGo_Hit.Description: Percent correct responses (Hits) for Go trials across all blocks

all_pGo_Miss.Description: Percent miss for Go trials across all blocks

all_pNoGo_Corr.Description: Percent correct responses for NoGo trials across all blocks

all_pNoGo_FA.Description: Percent false alarms for NoGo trials across all blocks

all_RTmeanGo_Hit.Description: Mean reaction time for correct Go responses across all blocks

all_RTmeanNoGo_FA.Description: Mean reaction time for incorrect NoGo responses (false alarms) across all blocks

all_RTmedGo_Hit.Description: Median reaction time for correct Go responses (hits) across all blocks

all_RTmedNoGo_FA.Description: Median reaction time for incorrect NoGo responses (false alarms) across all blocks

all_z_Hit.Description: z-score for Go hit percentage across all blocks (pGo_Hit)

all_z_FA.Description: z-score for false alarm percentage across all blocks (pNoGo_FA)

all_z_Hit_mm.Description: z-score for Go hit percentage across all blocks, following Macmillian adjustments for extreme values (i.e., Hit rate == 1)

all_z_FA_mm.Description: z-score for false alarm percentage across all blocks, following Macmillian adjustments for extreme values (i.e., False alarm rate == 0)

all_z_Hit_ll.Description: z-score for Go hit percentage across all blocks, following loglinear adjustments

all_z_FA_ll.Description: z-score for false alarm percentage across all blocks, following loglinear adjustments

all_d_prime_mm.Description: d': measure of sensory sensitivity across all blocks, calculated with Macmillian adjusted values (z_Hit_mm and z_FA_mm)

all_d_prime_ll.Description: d': measure of sensory sensitivity across all blocks, calculated with loglinear adjusted values (z_Hit_ll and z_FA_ll)

all_A_prime_mm.Description: A': nonparametric measure of sensory sensitivity across all blocks, calculated with Macmillian adjusted values (z_Hit_mm and z_FA_mm)

all_A_prime_ll.Description: A': nonparametric measure of sensory sensitivity across all blocks, calculated with loglinear adjusted values (z_Hit_ll and z_FA_ll)

all_c_mm.Description: c, measure of bias across all blocks, calculated with Macmillian adjusted values (z_Hit_mm and z_FA_mm)

all_c_ll.Description: c, measure of bias across all blocks, calculated with calculated with loglinear adjusted values (z_Hit_ll and z_FA_ll)

all_Grier_beta_mm.Description: Grier's beta, a nonparametric measure of response bias across all blocks, calculated with Macmillian adjusted values (z_Hit_mm and z_FA_mm)

all_Grier_beta_ll.Description: Grier's beta, a nonparametric measure of response bias across all blocks, calculated with loglinear adjusted values (z_Hit_ll and z_FA_ll)

b1_nNoGo.Description: Number of NoGo trials across block 1
